channel.title: Spying Information
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Spying Information" - Data Gathered about other Villages

item.title: Re: Spying Information
item.content:encoded: Heh, i am hokage of another village but this information May be a little helpful. I got interested when i saw pokemon village and moy old village =oPokemon village= betrayed houls village to i am gonna keepthe pokemon village stuff in mind. =O

item.title: Re: Spying Information
item.content:encoded: It's data we've been collecting on other Villages to make it easier to plan spying and attacking.

item.title: Re: Spying Information
item.content:encoded: WTF is all that?…

item.title: Re: Spying Information
item.content:encoded: Vampires upgrade : Undead Guards

item.title: Re: Spying Information
item.content:encoded:
3/22 Report

Mirage Village - Precious Metals - D9+5? S5 - Creepy Traps, Spy Towers, Infiltration Squad (Ninjutsu, Taijutsu) <==== Infiltrated
Konoha Village - Precious Metals - D9+5? S5 - Creepy Traps, Spy Towers, Infiltration Squad (not Ninjutsu) <==== Infiltrated
Hiro Gama Village - Medicinal Water - D9+5? S7 - Creepy Traps, Spy Towers, Undead, Infiltration Squad (Ninjutsu) <==== Infiltrated
Lemon Village - Precious Metals - D9+5? S5 - Creepy Traps, Spy Towers, Infiltration Squad (Ninjutsu, Genjutsu) <==== Infiltrated
Bear Village - Medicinal Water - D9+5? S7 - Creepy Traps, Spy Towers, Undead, Infiltration Squad (Ninjutsu) <==== Infiltrated
Random Village - Brilliant Crystals - D9+5? S7 - Creepy Traps, Spy Towers, Undead, Infiltration Squad (Ninjutsu) <==== Infiltrated

What exactly is this "Undead lurking about" thing? It seems to increase difficulty by 2. Is it a monster upgrade?

You know, I just realized that "There's an Infiltration Squad lurking around.." means that they have Special Forces, so I don't need to list both.

On another note, man do I love the Second Face jutsu!

item.title: Re: Spying Information
item.content:encoded:
Erg, we're really having a hard time finding precious metals. At least Hikikomori is a pretty easy target for water in the future.

Dragon's pretty much believed to be a dead Village. They consistently poor really really low in the Village rankings.
